title: AN ACT relating to hospital price transparency.
subject: Administrative Regulations and Proceedings
Consumer Affairs
Health and Medical Services
Hospitals and Nursing Homes
State Agencies

abstracts.abstract: Create new sections of KRS Chapter 216B to define terms; require hospitals to disclose prices for certain items and services provided by hospitals; require hospitals to provide descriptions of different services and standard charges of those services; require the Cabinet for Health and Family Services to promulgate administrative regulations, monitor each facility's compliance, and provide administrative penalties; prohibit collective action of debt for noncompliant facilities.
